definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他降雪如羊毛，撒霜如炉灰。

sentences.english: Megeve ski station started its season early thanks to the recent snowfalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近的降雪已拉开了梅杰夫滑雪站的赛季。

sentences.english: China Weather Reuters Currently, in most parts of Liaoning, snowfall is continuing.
sentences.chinese: 中国天气网讯目前，辽宁大部分地区的降雪仍在继续。

sentences.english: More than 24 inches (61 centimeters) of snow had fallen in parts of New England by the evening of January 12.
sentences.chinese: 截至1月12日，新英格兰地区降雪达到24英寸。

sentences.english: That week alone, they had snow 60 cm thick.
sentences.chinese: 单就那一周，他们就遭遇60厘米厚的降雪。

sentences.english: However the snowfall was not considered sufficient to make much difference to the crop.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这场降雪并不足以对冬小麦起到很大的作用。
新的降雪使耕地更加宽阔。

sentences.english: More than 100 inches of snow has fallen in parts of Oswego County.
sentences.chinese: 在奥斯维格县的部分地区，降雪量达100英寸以上。

sentences.english: I was able to capture a sequence of images recording the snowfall.
sentences.chinese: 我能捕捉到记录着降雪过程的图像序列。

sentences.english: He giveth snow like wool: scattered the hoarfrost like ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他降雪如羊毛，撒霜如炉灰。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Winter Snow, This screen saver shows snow falling onto snow - covered mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这个屏幕保护程序显示往冰雪覆盖高山上的降雪。

sentences.english: Fierce wind and snow hounded the flight as the plane trekked through the Andes mountains.
sentences.chinese: 飞机行至安第斯山脉上空时遭遇强风和降雪。

sentences.english: He spreads the snow like wool and scatters the frost like ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他降雪如羊毛，撒霜如炉灰。

sentences.english: The heaviest snowfalls today are expected in the south east.
sentences.chinese: 今天最大的降雪预计将出现在东南部地区。

sentences.english: Next they will apply the work to snowfall and hail.
sentences.chinese: 他们下一步将把这套系统应用在预测降雪和冰雹上。

sentences.english: Zurich snow reached 73 centimeters, maximum 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 苏黎世降雪量达73厘米，为10年来最多。

definition: precipitation over a large area/widespread rain
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
